column2: nCoV line listings from DXY.cn maintained by NIH Fogarty

2019 Novel Coronavirus line listings obtained exclusively from DXY.cn by manual data entry. DXY.cn (D?ngXi?ngYuán) is an online community for medical professionals and news sharing of medical importance. DXY.cn provides a curated list of broadcasts for 2019 nCoV case reports from official Chinese sources: https://3g.dxy.cn/newh5/view/pneumonia
